channel.title: How can i change the combat lvl
channel.description: hi guys how can i change the combat lvl from 185 to 126 ??

item.title: How can i change the combat lvl
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

heres the void youll need to change

	public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
		int points = 0;
		int output = 0;

		for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) {
			points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
			output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
			if (output >= exp) {
				return lvl;
			}
		}
		return 135;
	}

where it says 135 is your level and where it says 300.0 is your skillxp the less the xp the easier to level

hope that helps

Read full topic
item.source: How can i change the combat lvl
